page.title: 06CLUBS/RECREATION-PORTPATRICK
page.content: Portpatrick (Dunskey) Golf Club has both an 18 and a 9 hole course. Portpatrick Bowling Club has a fine green and 3 tennis courts. Both clubs are private but visitors are made most welcome. The putting green, also privately owned, is popular with locals and holidaymakers, especially children, who enjoy nearby swings and paddling pool maintained by Wigtown District Council, as is Portpatrick Public Hall which is underutilised due to the church and school halls also being available. The District Council has offered the use of the hall,{free of {charge,}to youth organisations and clubs for young people. It is hoped that this will lead to greater use of the hall. {For remaining clubs/recreation in {village see Survey Grid 02000552. }
